Pod computer: Completion sequence finished. Unit online. Releasing 
now.

The pod opened. A blinding light came out of it along with a ferocious 
and loud roar. A huge metallic form came out of it, rose about 400 
feet in the sky then came back down. It was a totally transmetal 
dragon.

AzureBlade: I AM WHOLE AGAIN! LET THE WEAK FALL UNDER THE MIGHT OF THE 
MAXIMALS!

He landed near the pod. He transformed to his new robot mode. He stood 
14 feet tall. His dragon arms protected his shoulders while providing 
some laser gun protection. On his waist, his dragon hind legs formed 
one huge hip mounted dual photon cannon. On each forearms, a jet wing 
formed shields and could energize plasma blades. He touched down and 
kneeled at Alpha's side.

AzureBlade:
Alpha... Do you hear me? It is I, AzureBlade...
